name: Aoraki Defense
description:
Description:

Aoraki Defense is a tower defense game. Help a boy protect his village against Terror lord and his armies. There are some spirits of forest near the village willing to lend a hand. Gathering energy and summon them to protect Aoraki village and wipe dark army out of the town.

Key Features:

  • 6 different creatures with different skills
  • 3 type of enemies with 5 different classes including 3 bosses
  • Upgrading system, up to 10
  • Evolution stage for each creature
  • 13 Levels to complete
  • Energy can be carry on to next level
